About me

Xivor is currently a proud member of the Damage In Damage Out [KDR] guild. He is the founder and former leader of the Chariot of Fire [FIRE] guild, and has extensive history in the leadership and administration of the Sanctum of Rall and Northern Shiverpeaks servers.
